name: Captain fly and sexy students
description:
Nobody expects a guest like him to be a superhero, so he can do anything he wants!

Twenty two year old sexy students and a fly captain.
He is free as a… well, fly, and he can get wherever he wants!

What flies love the most? Poo of course!
Gather stinky treasure to recharge Captain’s greatest ability - penetrating eyesight.
Go ahead and inspect every nook and cranny of the building.
Remember to feed hero with moldy food to refuel his energy and vitality on this exciting journey!

Fly the captain around the building and after collecting the right amount of poo use his super eyes that are able to see through clothes.

Featured:

- collecting poo
- collecting food
- using penetrating eyesight captain fly
- naked girls
